title: KHR_collision_shapes glTF Node Shape Reference
description: Properties enabling a node extension to reference a collision shape

shape.description: The index of the shape in the top level shapes array.

useNodeWeights.description: If true, use weights associated with this node to deform the referenced mesh
useNodeWeights.gltf_detailedDescription: This allows assets to describe the common use-case of animating an equivalent deformation to a node's render mesh and the collision geometry, without having to duplicate the weights between the node and the collision shape. When true, the referenced shape **MUST** be a mesh type, which **MUST** use the same number of morph targets as the node which this object is attached to. Note, the mesh referenced by the shape **MAY** differ from the mesh referenced by the node, provided they have the same number of morph targets; this allows collision shapes to use simplified geometry.
